channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- TRIRIGA Application Platform
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- TRIRIGA Application Platform

item.title: CVE-2023-27876|2023-04-07T13:21:17.033Z -- ibm -- tririga%20application%20platform
item.description: IBM TRIRIGA 4.0 is vulnerable to an XML external entity injection (XXE) attack when processing XML data. A remote attacker could exploit this vulnerability to expose sensitive information or consume memory resources. IBM X-Force ID: 249975.
